feed.title: GitHub F# Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of F# in GitHub

entry.title: PawelStadnicki/Florence
entry.summary:
Simple DSL for instant municipal analysis

Florence valuates and visualizes city places with just a single F# function:

'place -> float

This function is all you need to write to address a particular municipal, social or business, challenge.

You do a geospatial analysis without even knowing you do geospatial analysis by using words like Lifespace, Friends, Places, etc.

About Florence

Data-driven cities need data-driven community leaders. Florence makes programming and data analysis more approachable for citizens who intend to become champions of change in their beloved cities or neighborhoods.

TODO

  • Use View Engine (Feliz.Engine?) instead of raw string for displaying HTML
  • Clean up formatters
    • Remove keyboard UI support (was only needed as a workaround for broken forms in notebooks)
    • Both Mapbox and FSQ takes to many parameters
